Positive:
Japan has confirmed the first case of infection from the new coronavirus that been reported in China, the health ministry announced on Thursday.

Negative: Japanese island is hit by a second wave of coronavirus after ending three-week lockdown when cases fell to single digits as infections soar to 135 in a week.

Positive:
Thailand has found a second case of a new Chinese coronavirus as they ramped up checks on Chinese visitors, nearly a million of whom are expected for Lunar New Year holidays next week.

74-year-old woman, who had been quarantined since arriving in was found to be infected.
Negative:
Chinese health authorities said on Saturday (Jan 18).

They had discovered four more cases following an outbreak 
of what is believed to be a new coronavirus strain in the central city of Wuhan.
